title: Add uploaded image as the site logo in the header

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded image file (1000795148-1.jpg) to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure it is available at runtime via the /assets/generated/ URL path.

quotes: i want this image in to header

acceptanceCriteria: The file frontend/public/assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg exists in the repo.
Loading /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg in the browser returns the image (no 404).

requirements.text: Update the site header logo rendering so the uploaded image (1000795148-1.jpg) is displayed in the header (and any other places that reuse the Logo component) instead of the current placeholder logo path (/assets/predicta-logo.png).

quotes: i want this image in to header

acceptanceCriteria: On all pages (Home/Products/About/Contact), the header displays the uploaded image as the logo.
The logo remains clear and properly sized in the header on both mobile and desktop (no overflow or layout break).
The logo image has appropriate English alt text (e.g., "Predicta Healthcare logo").

requirements.text: Centralize the logo path so the Logo component reads the logo URL from the branding theme configuration (frontend/src/branding/theme.ts), and set that configured logo path to /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg.

quotes: i want this image in to header

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/branding/theme.ts exports a logo path that points to /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx uses the themeâ€™s exported logo path (not a hardcoded string).
Header and Footer continue to render the Logo component without errors.

constraints: Do not serve images from the backend; use static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to routing/navigation behavior beyond what is required to display the logo image in the header.
